detectors.description:
Shrink.slitherConstructorVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#52-131) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 200000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#59)

[Shrink.slitherConstructorVariables()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#L52-L131) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_totalSupply = 200000000000000000000](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#L59)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- Shrink.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#70-72)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#41)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Shrink.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#74-76)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#42)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#43)
	- Shrink.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#78-80)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Shrink.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#88-103)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#44)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Shrink.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#105-109)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Shrink.sol#45)
